resources.string: The Travel Guide App《旅游指南 App》
This app requires camera access in order to scan QR codes.
No back-facing sufficiently capable camera available!
Camera is disabled by device policy
Camera was disconnected before it was opened
You\'ve denied a permission that the app needs for core functionality. If you selected "don\'t ask again" in the past then you need to use Settings to re-enable the permission.
Access to the camera is needed for QR detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
